22139.「う…ううん！\n まだ賢者には なっていないの。\n でも 今 転職の試験を:
Uh...no! I'm not a sage yet. But I just
finished my exams for my new job, and...

22141.「彼女が 幼なじみの シェリル。\n あのドゥラさまと 院長の座を争ったほど\n:
Her is my childhood friend, Cheryl. She's a sage who is so talented that she competed with that Director Dura for the position of
Director.

22142.「ドゥラさまと シェリルのふたりで\n ドルワームの知を司る 賢狼の爪と牙……な:
Dura and Cheryl are so amazing that they are
called the claws and fangs of the wise wolf
who controls the knowledge of Dolworm.

22143.「最近は この研究院にも\n 顔を 出さなくなったんだけど\n 今日は どうした:
I haven't seen you here at the institute
lately, but I was wondering what happened
today...

22144.<if_woman>「ああっ！ ごめんね また話が脱線しちゃった！\n <pc>:
Ah! Sorry, I got sidetracked again! I'll let
Tiza know that <pc> passed the exam,
don't worry!

22145.<if_woman>「ティーザさんの所に行けば\n 賢者に 転職できるようにして:
You can go to Tiza and she'll help you become
a sage! Congratulations <pc>!
